subject: Football
Sentences (Criminal)
Drugs (Pharmaceuticals)
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: The former N.F.L. quarterback Ryan Leaf was sentenced to nine months of lockdown addiction treatment after pleading guilty to breaking into a house and illegally possessing painkillers.
snippet: The former N.F.L. quarterback Ryan Leaf was sentenced to nine months of lockdown addiction treatment after pleading guilty to breaking into a house and illegally possessing painkillers.
